translation.en: Sweetheart.
Go over to the window right now...
...and open it as wide as you can.
Please let me sleep.
I think your mother's here from Mexico...
...and she needs to leave.
Open the window now.
Why don't you open it, you lazy--
Somebody, help!
Close your mouth!
No way. Can I ride him?
A deer!
Daddy, I left the front door open in case any animals wanted to come in.
translation.zh: 爸，我大门没关，想让动物进来

translation.en: -You did, huh? -And one did.
-Yeah. -Yeah, one crazy-ass one.
No, you did a nice thing, sweetheart.
Greg, I'm gonna need a bat!
-Daddy, no! -No, no, I'm not going to hit the deer.
translation.zh: 爸，不要 我不会打它

translation.en: I'm just going to massage his head for a little bit with it.
Okay, come on, come on.
He's right here. He's eating Bowser's food.
translation.zh: 它在这里，吃小包的狗食

translation.en: Okay, he knows we're here now.
Stay. Stay.
What's he looking at?
Move your doll towards me.
And back to you.
Towards me.
Back to you.
Three times, fast.
Give me that thing.
-Mr. Gigglesworth? -No, don't worry. Give it to me.
translation.zh: 孙小空？ 别担心，给我

translation.en: -Go on. It's okay. It's okay. -Put it in my hand.
Roxanne, take them in there. Over there.
translation.zh: 罗珊，带他们进去 待在那里

translation.en: Hey, dude. You like this guy?
You want to play with him?
All right, let's go play in the other room.
Come on. Come on, man.
Slowly walk with me.
I said slowly.
Get out of the way!
Problem solved.
Mr. Gigglesworth! Daddy, he's killing him!
New problem begins.
I'm sorry.
Is that your bra, Mrs. Feder?
translation.zh: 那是你的胸罩吗，费德太太？

translation.en: Easy.
-Thank you, all right. -Cool, yeah. Yeah, come on.
Twenty-eight?
Yes.
Thirty-five.
That's right again, smarty-pants.
Hi, Dad.
-Hey, Bean, working on the math, huh? -Yep.
Mommy said if I get all my math questions right,
I get to ride my bike to school with Becky Feder.
translation.zh: 我就能跟小贝一起骑车上学

translation.en: Really? Okay, Bean, well, what's seven plus nine?
Seventy-nine.
Is he a little boy or a computer? Because I can't figure it out.
translation.zh: 他跟电脑一样，我都不会算呢

translation.en: Don't destroy his confidence.
Happy summer, everybody.
Okay, you sure you want to go with those boots, honey?
translation.zh: 好吧 你真的要穿这双靴子，宝贝？

translation.en: I know you bedazzled them yourself.
translation.zh: 我知道是你精心制作的

translation.en: I'm just wondering if they'll attract...
translation.zh: 我知道是你精心制作的 太炫了，恐怕连外星人...

translation.en: ...too much attention, you know, from outer space.
translation.zh: 太炫了，恐怕连外星人... 都看得到

translation.en: It's the last day of school... ...and Mom says I'm free to express myself.
translation.zh: 今天学期最后一天妈说我能展现自我

translation.en: Building the confidence right here with R2-D2.
translation.zh: 模仿闪亮三姐妹能建立信心

translation.en: Confidence. K-O-B-R-Q-V-Y. Confidence.
Well, we're not gonna have to pay for college. That's for sure.
translation.zh: 看来他不必花钱上大学了

translation.en: Looks like a horse took a dump in Ronnie's diaper.
You're gonna need federal aid to clean that up.
translation.zh: 要请清洁大队来清理才行

translation.en: Ronnie, honey, did a doo-doo grenade go off in your diaper?
translation.zh: 小朗，你小屁屁火山爆发吗？

translation.en: -You gonna change it? -That's not my son, that's your son.
translation.zh: -你要换吗？-他不是我儿子，是你儿子

translation.en: Yesterday was my diaper day.
translation.zh: 昨天我负责换尿布，今天换你

translation.en: Today he is all yours, and it's gonna get nasty.
translation.zh: 昨天我负责换尿布，今天换你 让你换到叫妈妈

translation.en: Go, Ronnie.
-Go, Ronnie, go, Ronnie. -Go, Ronnie, go, Ronnie.
He looks like Nicki Minaj... ...trying to shake her butt implants back into place.
translation.zh: 他好像唐老鸭在跳嘻哈

translation.en: -Go, Ronnie, go, Ronnie. -Come on, Ronnie.
translation.zh: 加油，小朗 -加油，小朗-过来，小朗

translation.en: Go, Ronnie.
translation.zh: -加油，小朗-过来，小朗 加油，小朗

translation.en: You got a lot of appointments today, sweetie?
Nah, just one repair job. Very special.
translation.zh: 只有一个地方，特别客户

translation.en: All right, I'm going in.
What is...?
What is this?
A necklace?
Happy 20th anniversary, babe.
Wow, Dad, you remembered.
Oh, yeah.
Mom didn't.
That's cold.
I think I'm gonna bust out of here.
So he gets off the train and nobody's there?
translation.zh: 他下了车你却没看到人？

translation.en: Braden needs to spend at least one summer with you...
translation.zh: 布雷登至少得跟你过一个暑假

translation.en: ...so he can say he has a dad, you deadbeat, Higgins.
translation.zh: 才能感受到自己有个老爸

translation.en: Well, not to be mean... ...but I'm not even a thousand percent sure who you are.
translation.zh: 抱歉，我根本不确定你是谁

translation.en: I was up from Florida.
Right in the middle of making out, I got a really bad case of the hiccups.
translation.zh: 当时亲热到一半，我突然大打嗝

translation.en: Hiccups McGee?
Oh, my God, I have a kid I don't know about with Hiccups McGee?
translation.zh: 我跟打嗝鸡有了孩子都不知道

translation.en: And no offense, but I'm gonna have to ask...
translation.zh: 不好意思，我要滴血认亲

translation.en: ...for a DNA test, you know, because you just never....
translation.zh: 不好意思，我要滴血认亲 这种事很难...

translation.en: No need.
Later, Hiccups.
You're him.
Yeah, without the hat.
It's actually a good likeness.
How you doing, man?
I'm your dad. Nice to see you, Braden.
That's strike one.
Good news is, you get... ...unlimited amount of strikes.
-How about I take you to school? -No school.
translation.zh: 我送你去学校吧？ 不用，现在是暑假

translation.en: Summertime.
Not yet. One more day. I know, it's a drag.
Normally I'd let you just blow it off and play hooky...
translation.zh: 本来我想让你自由活动

translation.en: ...but I'm volunteering at the soup kitchen today.
translation.zh: 但今天我要去慈济当义工

translation.en: So when I'm done...
...I'll come pick you up and we'll hang out.
I got you this, but....
Obviously, you're, like, 13, so I don't know.
But it's actually pretty nice...
...and cute, and you should cut the head off it, okay.
Well, let's get going.
-Yo, yo, yo, don't forget this. -Is it a gift?
translation.zh: 别忘了这个 -礼物吗？-不，孙小空的遗体

translation.en: No, it's the Gigglesworth massacre.
I told Becky you could sew it back together for her.
What? Martha Stewart couldn't fix this.
translation.zh: 什么？叫祖母来也没办法

translation.en: Come on.
But you're such a good daddy for picking up all the pieces.
translation.zh: 你真是好爸爸，面面俱到

translation.en: That's why I've been thinking...
...we moved back here to your hometown... ...so we could have more quality time with our family, right?
translation.zh: 搬回你老家，改善家庭生活品质

translation.en: -That's right. -How would you feel about expanding?
translation.zh: 没错 家里再多个成员好不好？

translation.en: -Having another kid? -Yeah.
But it's perfect right now, you know?
If I buy one large pizza, Greg gets two pieces,
translation.zh: 买一个大批萨，小葛吃两片小凯吃两片

translation.en: Keith gets two, Becky gets one, you get one, I get four.
translation.zh: 买一个大批萨，小葛吃两片小凯吃两片 小贝一片，你一片，我四片

translation.en: It's kind of perfect, you know. I don't want to have to buy another pie.
translation.zh: 刚刚好，我不想再多买一个

translation.en: Why don't you go on a diet, fat gordo éste?
Come on, I've had a job since I'm 16.
It's the first time I've got a free schedule. I'm just enjoying the fun.
translation.zh: 现在才轻松点，让我享享福嘛

translation.en: Don't forget Becky's ballet recital at 11.
translation.zh: 小贝的芭蕾发表会在11点

translation.en: I got to go to that?
I mean, I get to go to that? Great.
I'm saying, that's-- I thought it was sold out. That's great news.
translation.zh: 我以为票卖光了，太好了

translation.en: Have the best last day of school, my gorgeous children! I love you all!
translation.zh: 学期最后一天愉快，乖孩子我爱你们

translation.en: -Bye, Mom, bye. -Bye, Mom.
Yeah, last day of school, Greg. Last chance to ask out Nancy Arbuckle.
translation.zh: 最后一天，小葛约南希出来的最后机会

translation.en: Nancy Arbuckle. What's that? You like a girl?
Is that why you've been taking them long showers?
No, I'm conditioning my hair. That's all I do in the shower, condition my hair.
translation.zh: 我在用护发素啦，边洗澡用护发素

translation.en: That's not what the deer told me. That deer's a liar.
translation.zh: -那只鹿不是这么说的-那只鹿说谎

translation.en: I heard too much conditioning can make you go blind.
translation.zh: 听说太常用护发素会变瞎子

translation.en: What? Where'd you hear that?
-Higgins. -I should kill him.
translation.zh: 希金斯 我要杀了他

translation.en: He's too chicken to ask her out, Dad, because she's the hottest girl in school.
translation.zh: 他不敢约她出来，因为她是校花

translation.en: And Greg is fugly.
So, what he's fugly? All the guys in our family are fugly.
translation.zh: 又怎样，我们家男生都是笑话

translation.en: That don't stop us from getting the hot chicks.
Look at me and look at your mother. I mean, it makes no sense.
translation.zh: 看看我和你妈，美女与野兽

translation.en: Only in, like, a Hollywood movie or something.
translation.zh: 这种组合只有好莱坞电影才有

translation.en: Every guy in school likes her, Dad.
translation.zh: 学校每个男生都喜欢她

translation.en: And you'll be the guy who ends up with her. You know why? You're gonna follow my three-step program.
translation.zh: 你一定钓得到她照我的追妹三部曲做就对了

translation.en: Number one, make the girl smile.
Number two, tell her she has a nice smile.
Number three, say she has to go out with you that night.
translation.zh: 第三，说她当天晚上得跟你出去

translation.en: Why that night?
Because it gives her less time to think about how fugly you are. Because you are fugly.
translation.zh: 她没空想你多好笑，因为你是笑话

translation.en: That's the stupidest thing I ever heard.
And Keithie's right, I'm too chicken to even talk to her.
translation.zh: 小凯说得对，我根本不敢跟她说话

translation.en: Hey, you're a Feder. Feders ain't afraid of women, buddy.
translation.zh: 你是费家人，我费家不怕女人

translation.en: That's not the way I'm raising you.
By the way, Dad, did you ask Mom if I can play football?
translation.zh: 爸，你有问妈我能打美式足球吗？

translation.en: No, I was scared.
I'm afraid she's gonna yell at me in that accent that no one understands.
Come on, Becky, it's 8:00.
School starts at 8:15.
That means we only have 25 minutes.
Daddy, you promise Mr. Gigglesworth will be better by bedtime?
translation.zh: 爸，上床前孙小空会变好吗？

translation.en: Will you stop worrying about him? He'll be fine. I love you.
translation.zh: 别担心了，他会很好的，我爱你

translation.en: -Have the best last day, okay? -Okay. -Bye, guys. -Bye, Daddy.
translation.zh: -最后一天愉快喔-拜，我也爱你

translation.en: -Love you. -And you read the street signs, okay?
translation.zh: -最后一天愉快喔-拜，我也爱你 注意交通号志，别听小豆的

translation.en: Don't let Bean.
translation.zh: 注意交通号志，别听小豆的

translation.en: My God, riding their bikes to school.
Couldn't do that in L.A. with the nuts out there.
Yeah, because thank God there's no crazy people out here.
translation.zh: 这里的人开车都很规矩

translation.en: How you doing, Nick?
My wife's leaving me after three weeks.
translation.zh: 我老婆要离开我了 才三个星期

translation.en: Three weeks? That's not bad for you.
What happened?
She found me eating a banana with my butt.
translation.zh: 她发现我在吃香蕉 用屁股吃

translation.en: And she didn't like that?
Yeah, she got really bummed out.
But, you know, I shouldn't have done it at her mom's house.
translation.zh: 我不该在她妈家那样做

translation.en: Yeah, you.... You seem like you're a little extra out of it today.
-What's going on? -Yeah, I'm a little medicated.
translation.zh: 你今天怪怪的，怎么了？ 我吃了点药

translation.en: I met a very reliable doctor at a Cypress Hill concert...
translation.zh: 我在演唱会上碰到一个医生

translation.en: ...and he floated me a couple pills just to feel better, you know.
translation.zh: 他给了我几颗药丸我感觉好多了

translation.en: But I don't feel better! You feel worse!
translation.zh: 我可没有感觉好多了你感觉更糟！

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, meet your new bus driver.
translation.zh: 各位同学，我是新校车司机

translation.en: Finally got yourself a job.
Actually I'm filling in for Drool-io Iglesias back there.
translation.zh: 我帮后面那位睡神代班

translation.en: -Hey, Deanne, happy anniversary. -Thank you, Lenny.
translation.zh: 蒂安，结婚周年快乐 谢谢你，雷尼

translation.en: Lenny remembered. Isn't that sweet?
-And I never got him pregnant. -She forgot?
translation.zh: 我竟然没把他肚子搞大 她忘了？

translation.en: -Yeah, she forgot. -No.
I got the biggest get-out-of-jail-free card in the world.
translation.zh: 这下我在家里有免死金牌了

translation.en: I want one of those.
You ain't never get one like this. Honey, I'm gonna take a ride to work with Lenny.
translation.zh: -我也要-你别想 老婆，我搭雷尼便车去上班

translation.en: Don't worry about forgetting the 20th. I'm sure you'll remember the 30th.
translation.zh: 忘了20周年没关系你一定会记得30周年

translation.en: I love you.
Yeah, sure you do, deep down.
That's not another necklace in there, is it?
I'm gonna abuse this get-out-of-jail-free card, I'm telling you right now.
translation.zh: 我要好好利用免死金牌

translation.en: I mean, maybe I'll walk on the good rug without taking off my boots.
translation.zh: 我要穿靴子走在高级地毯上

translation.en: Or have a nice non-diet soda with my dinner.
Not just one, either, a whole damn pitcher.
-So you're going full gangsta. -Yeah. But you know what I'd really like to do?
translation.zh: 在家当痞子就是了 知道我最想做什么吗？

translation.en: Throw a "first night of summer" party. Something a little crazy.
Well, it's been many, many years since we've done something crazy.
translation.zh: 我们几百年没干疯狂的事了

translation.en: Just one problem, though. My house isn't big enough.
translation.zh: 只是有个问题，我家不够大

translation.en: But yours is.
Last party I had was senior year in high school.
That was like the best night of my life. We all hooked up with chicks.
translation.zh: 那是我人生的高潮我们全都上了马子

translation.en: Come on, why not do that again?
Because we already have chicks and kids and high cholesterol now, so just--
translation.zh: 我们有马子了还有孩子还有胆固醇过高

translation.en: It's time to move on. You want to come over tonight with Dee, that's fine, I think.
translation.zh: 不能再那么疯了 你晚上可以和蒂安过来但我得先问我老婆

translation.en: -I got to ask my wife first. -Okay, gangsta.
translation.zh: 你晚上可以和蒂安过来但我得先问我老婆 好，兄弟

translation.en: Hey. Hey, where'd you get those shoes, Losers "R" Us?
translation.zh: 嘿 哪里买的？阿瘦皮鞋吗？

translation.en: I made them.
You made them? In a toilet?
translation.zh: 自己做？用垃圾当材料吗？

translation.en: That kid is like white Precious.
-Get lost, Duffy. -Yeah, leave her alone.
translation.zh: 闪边，达菲 对，别闹她

translation.en: Hey, what'd you say, Hollywood?
-You got something to say to me? -Nothing, nothing, nothing.
Attention, Kmart shoppers, let's find a seat, please.
Yes, you in the camouflage jacket and Mariah Carey hairdo.
translation.zh: 穿迷彩装留妹妹头那位

translation.en: Yeah, just pop a squat, thank you.
You're lucky your dad's here, but he won't be here all day.
translation.zh: 幸好你爸罩你，下次就难说了

translation.en: -Leave me alone. -Beanbag with arms and legs...
translation.zh: 少惹我 那个有手有脚的马铃薯

translation.en: ...seriously, take a seat, or seats, before someone gets hurt.
translation.zh: 请坐下 以免压伤别人

translation.en: You're dead, man.
I'm gonna go get some things done...
...and then I'm gonna go to my daughter's ballet recital...
translation.zh: 然后去我女儿的芭蕾发表会

translation.en: ...so you're on your own until lunchtime.
No worries. No one will come in anyway.
Right.
Does Leonard ever talk about me?
-Leonard? -Your husband.
Oh, Lenny.
I probably should have told you this before I started working here...
translation.zh: 当初来上班前就该告诉你的

translation.en: ...but he used to be my boyfriend.
translation.zh: 当初来上班前就该告诉你的 他以前是我男友

translation.en: When did you guys go out?
Sixth grade.
This one time, we split a piece of bubble gum at recess.
translation.zh: 有一次，我们合吃一颗泡泡糖

translation.en: I brought in a note...
...that he sent me, and I thought you should see it.
translation.zh: 我带了他给我的字条 你应该看看

translation.en: I just felt weird having a secret with you.
"Do you like my hair better in a barrette or a headband?"
That's what I wrote.
-"Barrette." -And that was his response.
-Does it bother you that I still wear it? -No, no, no, I think it's sweet.
translation.zh: 你介意我还绑着吗？ 不会，很可爱

translation.en: I think he still has feelings for me.
I'm gonna go work out now.
Do you really think that a tight, toned body...
translation.zh: 我要去健身房了 你以为靠火辣身材就能让他忘掉青梅竹马吗？

translation.en: ...will keep him away from his Hubba Bubba baby?
translation.zh: 你以为靠火辣身材就能让他忘掉青梅竹马吗？

translation.en: I hope so. Bye.
You just messed with the wrong girl, chica!
They spray-painted my baby, and everything's spelled right.
translation.zh: （2013毕业班）他们乱喷我的爱车 字没拼错，肯定不是我学生

translation.en: These can't be my students.
translation.zh: 字没拼错，肯定不是我学生

translation.en: Have a nice day, Rapunzel.
Hey, guys, can you believe this?
Calendar turns to June... ...my wonderful students, they become animals.
translation.zh: 每到六月，学生就变禽兽

translation.en: They're just mad you keep going to the babyGap to buy your clothes.
translation.zh: 他们只是气你老爱买童装来穿

translation.en: -Hey, Principal Tardio, good morning. -Right to class, right to class.
How was your last ride in before the summer, Nick?
translation.zh: 暑假前最后一趟车还好吗，尼克？

translation.en: Remember, today is only a half a day.
-And a half a shirt, right? -What?
-I said he wants to wave goodbye to you. -Okay.
translation.zh: 他想跟你挥手道别，你看

translation.en: -Here he goes. -I'm excited about the summer, too.
translation.zh: 他想跟你挥手道别，你看 暑假来临我也很兴奋

translation.en: Hey, that's my laptop! That's not waterproof!
translation.zh: 那是我的笔记本，不能浸水

translation.en: -Monkey boy, monkey boy. -Summer!
-Monkey boy. -Summer!
Summer! Summer!
So, what do you think? Do I take you straight to work?
I got one appointment I got to get to sometime between 8 a.m. and 4 p.m.
translation.zh: 我八点到四点之间有个客户

translation.en: -But she can wait. -Good. And look at this.
translation.zh: 不过她可以等 好，你看

translation.en: -He's back at it again. -Why isn't he at work?
translation.zh: 他又来找她了 他怎么没上班？

translation.en: He's just-- This woman has a grip on him. It's ridiculous. It's gonna ruin his marriage.
translation.zh: 这女人把他吃得死死的 真扯，他婚姻完蛋了

translation.en: Thank you for breakfast, Mommy.
Will you be coming by to watch Days of Our Lives later?
translation.zh: 你会来看《我们的日子》吗？

translation.en: Well, we got to find out which twin murdered Renaldo, right?
translation.zh: 你会来看《我们的日子》吗？ 我们要看是谁杀了男主角

translation.en: We sure do.
-Okay. -Hey, Mrs. Lamonsoff, good to see you.
Nice school bus, Lenny.
Thank you. Have a great day.
-Did Mommy make the boo-boo go away? -Don't tell the wife.
translation.zh: 你妈有帮你换尿布吗？ 别跟我老婆讲，你们在干嘛？

translation.en: -What are you guys doing? -Get in.
translation.zh: 别跟我老婆讲，你们在干嘛？ 上来

translation.en: Oh, hey, Nick.
Nice. Nice. Let's hit it.
Watch this.
-You got to respect that. -That was awesome.
What's Lenny's problem? They're so cute when they're little.
translation.zh: 雷尼是怎样？孩子小时候超可爱

translation.en: I know. I miss it.
Hey, Ronnie. Ronnie.
You miss that? Really?
Stay. Stay. Don't you growl at me.
Stay, baby, stay.
Excuse me. Is your kid gonna be in here when the instructor comes in?
translation.zh: 请问，教练上课时你小孩会在吗？

translation.en: That's not my kid. That's my lover, and he's very gentle.
translation.zh: 他不是我小孩，是我爱人他很温柔的

translation.en: Kids don't belong in here. That leash better not trip me up.
translation.zh: 小孩不能进来，别把我绊倒

translation.en: Leash isn't gonna trip you up.
It's your big-ass, hairy man feet that are gonna trip you up.
translation.zh: 你会被自己的大屁股和毛毛腿绊倒

translation.en: She was just joking around, sir.
Cool it. You're gonna get us killed.
Welcome to Squat Fitness, ladies.
translation.zh: 欢迎光临亚粒三大健身房

translation.en: Apparently your new instructor's running a bit late.
translation.zh: 看来你们新教练迟到了

translation.en: I'm sorry. It's only five till--
Yeah, so he asked me to lead you in some warm-up exercises.
translation.zh: 对，他请我先带各位暖身

translation.en: So, everybody, up on your feet...
...and let's take a deep breath.
Good. Deeper. Really stretch out those lungs.
And now let's shimmy. Shake the shoulders back and forth.
translation.zh: 现在抖动，肩膀前后抖动

translation.en: Shake them. Very good, very good.
translation.zh: 现在抖动，肩膀前后抖动 非常好

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, yeah.
Now let's do some jackhammer squats.
Put your hands in front of you like this. Just relax.
translation.zh: 手像这样放在前面，放轻松

translation.en: And then squat up and down but fast. Faster, faster, there you go.
Really fast. Faster, faster. Too fast. Do it a little slower.
translation.zh: 再快一点...快点... 太快了，慢一点

translation.en: Now, everybody turn, face the back of the room, bend over...
...and reach for your toes.
-Why do we have to turn around? -If you please.
And bend over as low as you can go.
Now take the right hand and slap it against the right cheek.
Relax the wrist and slap that right butt, slap it.
translation.zh: 手腕放松拍右边屁股，用力

translation.en: Good, I want to hear that slap.
Yes, this is wonderful.
Morning, ladies.
-You started without me? -Yes, just like you asked me to.
translation.zh: 不等我就开始了？ 对，是你叫我来的

translation.en: -Say it's true even if it isn't. -What?
translation.zh: 就算不是也要说是 什么？

translation.en: You loved it! You loved it!
Yeah, that's my boy.
-All right. -You're all prostitutes!
Anyway, I'm Kyle...
...and welcome to the summer session of Squatrobics 101.
translation.zh: 欢迎参加暑期蹲蹲有氧基础班

translation.en: I wish they called it something else, but that's what they told me to say.
translation.zh: 我也不知道这名称谁取的

translation.en: Okay, so, before we start for real, any questions?
-Yes. -Are you married?
No. Nope, I'm single.
-Yeah. -I forgot.
translation.zh: 请说 我忘了，你帅到让我头昏对不起

translation.en: You're so gorgeous, my head is spinning. I'm sorry. God.
translation.zh: 我忘了，你帅到让我头昏对不起

translation.en: Go ahead.
I have a very important question, and it's a two-parter.
translation.zh: 我的问题很重要，有两部分

translation.en: The first part of the question is, did a scientist make you in a lab?
translation.zh: 第一，你是实验室做出来的吗？

translation.en: And the second part of the question is... ...can I stick my tongue down your throat, please?
All right, guys, look, I'm flattered. Really, I am.
But most of you are married, and I happen to be gay.
translation.zh: 不过你们大多是人妻 我也刚好是同志

translation.en: -Gay. All of them. -That sucks! What a waste!
translation.zh: -讨厌-最好是 -真烦-都这样 暴殄天物

translation.en: -Stay out of my bag, little man. -Why does she have this?
translation.zh: 别碰我的包包，小子 她怎么有这个？

translation.en: That's not a jock strap, that's a G-string.
translation.zh: 这不是后空内裤，是丁字裤

translation.en: Well, well, well...
...if it isn't Hollywood... ...and the Squares.
Hey, Malcolm, I didn't know you worked at Kmart...
translation.zh: 马康，我不知道你在凯马特上班

translation.en: ...and apparently the hair on top of your head didn't know it, either.
translation.zh: 看来你头顶的毛也不知道

translation.en: What?
Do me a favor, go like this. I think I got something in my teeth.
translation.zh: 头低下来让我照，我牙缝有菜渣

translation.en: -What? -You know,
next time, you should use that Chia Pet stuff on your whole head.
translation.zh: 你应该整颗头都植发才对

translation.en: What?
Why is Higgins buying O.J.'s knife right now?
translation.zh: 希金斯怎么在买妈妈嘴小刀？

translation.en: -You think you're tough? -Hey, Malcolm,
is that the knife the Indians used to half-scalp you with?
translation.zh: 马康，印第安人用那种刀剃你头吗？

translation.en: I don't even get that. What?
Come on, let's cheer him up Benny Hill-style. Here we go.
-Come on, come on, come on. -Does that make you feel better?
Yo, Crocodile Dumb-dee, how'd it go with the kid?
translation.zh: 小李飞刀，跟儿子见面如何？

translation.en: Good, good. He's in school.
Kid's in school for one day?
I didn't know what else to do. He's a thug, Lenny.
translation.zh: 我不知道怎么办，他是流氓

translation.en: He cut the head off a teddy bear. Imagine what he'll do to me.
translation.zh: 他砍掉泰迪熊的头你想他会怎么对我

translation.en: So you're gonna buy this to cut his head off?
translation.zh: 所以你买刀要砍他的头？

translation.en: No, I just want him to think I'll cut his head off... ...so then he won't cut my head off.
translation.zh: 不，我让他以为我会动手那样他才不会砍我头

translation.en: You want to scare a relative without causing permanent injury?
translation.zh: 想吓唬亲人又不想太过分吗？

translation.en: May I suggest this?
Sir? Sir? Can you get off the bed?
translation.zh: 先生 请你下床好吗？

translation.en: It's wake-up time!
All right, Grandma, I'm up! Stop yelling at me.
translation.zh: 好，祖母，我起来了 别吼了

translation.en: Now, why is...? Being mean? I like sleeping over. It's just you always yell.
translation.zh: 干嘛这么凶？我喜欢来这过夜可是你老爱乱吼

translation.en: You don't have to yell at me.
I love you.
I don't understand.
Clean-up, aisle nine.
Get out of me!
And bring a shovel.
So my son Bumpty told me... ...he's gonna ask your daughter out on a date at school today.
translation.zh: 我儿子帮提说今天要约你女儿出去

translation.en: First of all, my daughter's never been out on a date before...
...and I'm sure she's not gonna start off with some kid named Bumpty.
translation.zh: 也不会一开始就找叫帮提的男生

translation.en: He is the only other black kid in her grade.
translation.zh: 全年级只有他们俩是黑人

translation.en: Wait, you want her to date a white guy?
translation.zh: 难道你要她跟白人约会？

translation.en: Yeah, Farrakhan.
I'd rather she date the whitest white guy in the world... ...than your little bald-headed boy.
translation.zh: 我宁愿她跟世界最白的白人约会也比跟你的秃头儿子好

translation.en: All right, but, you know, don't worry when she says yes... ...because I already had the talk with him.
translation.zh: 你女儿答应的话也别担心我已经跟他聊过了

translation.en: -What talk? -Dating.
I told him how we used to roll with the ladies in high school.
translation.zh: 我教他我们在高中都怎么追女孩

translation.en: You know, beep-beep.
What?!
I should get some pepper spray for my kid.
translation.zh: 我应该买胡椒喷雾给我儿子

translation.en: Some moron on the bus keeps messing with him... ...and he refuses to fight back.
translation.zh: 校车上有个猪头一直欺负他他又不敢反击

translation.en: You know, that reminds me of someone I know.
translation.zh: 这让我想起我认识的一个人

translation.en: -Who? -You.
What are you talking about? I got in plenty of fights.
Remember ninth grade when Tommy Cavanaugh... ...moved here from Texas?
translation.zh: 记得九年级时汤米搬来这吗？

translation.en: He nonstop abused you, and you did nothing about it.
translation.zh: 他一直欺负你，你却只有忍气吞声

translation.en: Tommy Cavanaugh was a 'roid freak. He had back zits on his back zits.
translation.zh: 汤米卡瓦纳吃太多类固醇背上的痘子多到能煮红豆汤

translation.en: Plus, he was joking around with me.
If it was real, I swear to God, I would've knocked him out.
translation.zh: 如果是真的，我一定痛扁他

translation.en: -Hey, isn't that Cavanaugh right there? -Where?
-Gotcha. -That was really funny, man. Really funny.
translation.zh: 吓到你了 一点也不好笑

translation.en: Hey, you weren't exactly Captain Courageous when we were growing up, were you?
translation.zh: 小时候你也没多勇猛，对吧？

translation.en: Hey, I never backed out of a fight, though.
Yeah, but did you ever jump off Suicide 35 at the quarry?
That's right. He always came up with a lame excuse not to do it.
-What are you talking about? -"I can't. I'm on my period. It'll attract sharks."
translation.zh: 你在说什么？ "不，我大姨妈来了，会引来鲨鱼"

translation.en: Suicide 35 off the top rock. Thirty-five feet above the water.
My mom did that jump when she was pregnant with me.
translation.zh: 我妈怀我的时候就跳过

translation.en: There's a raft in there?
Who did that?
All right, little birds, find your nests, man.
Float down. There we go, and we're in.
All right, guys, normally we don't have exciting news this late into the term...
translation.zh: 学期末通常没什么新鲜事

translation.en: ...but we have a new student joining us today, Braden Higgins.
translation.zh: 但今天有新同学来，布雷登希金斯

translation.en: Hey, there's an empty seat over there, man. Why don't you go cop a squat.
Or go that way, man. Take your own path.
No.
I sit here.
Is your dad Marcus Higgins?
translation.zh: 你爸是马克斯希金斯吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I've known him since I was a baby. He's the funniest.
translation.zh: 我从小就认识他，他超搞笑

translation.en: The best. Great, great man.
I want to smash his face.
-Yeah, me, too. -Yeah, I hate that guy.
Screw him.
Yo, Charlotte, hold up, hold up. Question:
translation.zh: 夏洛蒂，等等 我问你

translation.en: How would you like to spend the first night of summer...
translation.zh: 想不想跟下一个后起之秀

translation.en: ...with a hardcore up-and-comer?
-What does that mean? -I think he's asking you out.
He is? You are?
-I don't make stuff up. -Well, can Donna come?
translation.zh: 是吗？ 没错 唐娜也可以去吗？

translation.en: Three's a crowd, McCloud. No, he didn't. Yes, he did.
translation.zh: 三人行必有我失 我竟然说出真心话

translation.en: It's okay, Charlotte. It's a date, your first date. Just you two.
translation.zh: 没关系，那是约会 我不当电灯泡

translation.en: All right. I mean, I'd have to ask my parents...
...but I think that would be okay.
Hey, Bumpty. You think just because it's the last day of school...
...you can sit and socialize the entire period?
translation.zh: 你就整堂课在上面泡妞吗？

translation.en: I don't think about stuff like that, Lady Shorts.
Well, can you think fast?
Who wants to watch me climb a rope?
You're the man!
Yo, he's got to put those Easter eggs back in the basket. Dang!
translation.zh: 他的复活节彩蛋快掉出来了

translation.en: Kelly, I don't want to hear it! I can't take it anymore!
translation.zh: 凯利，我不想听 我要抓狂了

translation.en: I wish I never had you! Stop it! Stop it!
translation.zh: 真想把你塞回肚子里 别闹了

translation.en: See, that's why I don't want four kids.
translation.zh: 看吧，所以我不想生四个

translation.en: Yeah, people with four just lose their minds. They're yelling, they're screaming.
translation.zh: 生四个会神经的，整天吼来吼去

translation.en: Sometimes they go to jail just to get some sleep.
Hold up. Hang on. I got a burpsnart coming.
-Come on. -You got to teach me how you do that.
A burpsnart? It's simple. You just start with a burp...
translation.zh: 嗝喷屁？超简单 先打嗝再打喷嚏，自然就会放屁

translation.en: ...then you sniff for a sneeze, you get that going, and that triggers a fart, always.
translation.zh: 先打嗝再打喷嚏，自然就会放屁

translation.en: What's up with this school bus?
Okay. I stole it.
What? Put your hands in the air.
And wave them like you just don't care Say "ho"
Say "ho"
-I heard you're having a party tonight, Lenny. -What? I'm not having a party.
translation.zh: 听说你今晚要办派对，雷尼 哪有，谁讲的？

translation.en: -Where did you hear that? -He's a cop. He hears everything.
translation.zh: 哪有，谁讲的？ 他是警察，消息很灵通

translation.en: Oh, God.
Look, it's Magnum P.U. Look at him getting all serious. I still can't believe...
translation.zh: 是霹雳警探，竟然这么正经

translation.en: ...you're a cop after all the sick stuff you did growing up.
translation.zh: 你以前那么变态现在竟然当警察

translation.en: The Peter Dante who stole your parents' snowmobile...
translation.zh: 为了买毒偷你爸妈雪车的那个人

translation.en: ...and sold it to purchase crack cocaine is dead, Feder.
translation.zh: 为了买毒偷你爸妈雪车的那个人 已经死了，费德

translation.en: This side of the law is way better. To serve and protect. Got to love it.
translation.zh: 当人民保姆比较适合我，真的

translation.en: Hey, McKenzie, I heard you assaulted somebody in there.
translation.zh: 麦肯吉，听说你在里面打人

translation.en: I didn't assault anybody. I just choked out your brother.
translation.zh: 没有，我只是勒你兄弟脖子

translation.en: Yeah, he deserves it. He's crazy.
We got five minutes to get to that stupid recital.
Recital? -At McDonough Elementary? -Yes.
-Can I come? -Why?
Trust me. Everybody's got to go.
We got five minutes. We're never gonna make it there.
You'll get there on time. We're gonna give you a four-alarm presidential police escort.
translation.zh: 别担心，警察帮你们开道

translation.en: -Isn't that against the law? -I am the law!
translation.zh: 那样不是违法吗？ 我就是法律

translation.en: What's happening?
Oh, my God! What just happened?
Welcome, parents, to final performance of school year...
translation.zh: 欢迎各位光临本学年最后一场表演

translation.en: ...our June-a-licious Dance Spectacular!
Now, for this year, we go throwing a few hip-hop moves in there.
translation.zh: 今年我们加上了一些嘻哈动作

translation.en: Like this.
Is fun to dance.
Let the show begin.
So nice of you to invite your friends and the bus driver...
translation.zh: 你真有心 请朋友、校车司机和警察来看女儿跳舞

translation.en: ...and the police force to our daughter's dance recital.
translation.zh: 请朋友、校车司机和警察来看女儿跳舞

translation.en: Yeah, huge ballet fans, all of them.
She's so cute.
-So cute. -She's adorable, isn't she? She is adorable.
-Fantastic stuff. -Unbelievable.
-Look at her go. -I am. I'm looking at her.
translation.zh: -你看看她-我目不转睛 跳得真好

translation.en: I want to arrest her for disturbing the peace.
In my pants.
I'm having a wonderful time.
She's got a solo?
What?
It's fine. I just wish that you would give me more than eight hours' notice....
translation.zh: 没关系，不过你应该提早告诉我

translation.en: ...before you tell me that we're throwing a party, babe.
It's not a party. Get out of here. It's a couple people coming by.
translation.zh: 那不是家庭派对，只是几个人聚聚

translation.en: How'd you like it?
-Hey! -You were great, honey.
Where did you learn to dance like that?
She moves like Yagger, no?
Yes, she does, she moves like Mick Yagger. Is that what she was saying?
translation.zh: 对，是的，她就像... 米克亚格尔或是？

translation.en: -Hey, butter buns, you ready to grab some eats? -Yes.
-Cavanaugh. -Lenny Feder, I'll be damned.
translation.zh: 卡瓦纳 雷尼费德，不会吧

translation.en: Honey, this is Tommy Cavanaugh. He was my old steroid that I grew up with.
translation.zh: 老婆，这是汤米卡瓦纳小时候的朋友

translation.en: -This is my.... -Wife. Roxanne.
-Why are your hands shaking, Daddy? -My hands are shaking?
translation.zh: 你的手怎么在发抖，爸？ 发抖？应该是早上喝太多咖啡了

translation.en: Probably because I had too much coffee this morning, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 发抖？应该是早上喝太多咖啡了

translation.en: I heard you been running around saying you could take me in a fight.
translation.zh: 听说你到处撂话说你能打倒我

translation.en: -You? I wouldn't say that. -Yeah, you did, this morning in Kmart.
translation.zh: 我哪会那样讲 有，早上在凯马特讲的

translation.en: Kmart? Was I there?
-I don't think I was there. -You know, all I can remember about this guy...
translation.zh: 凯马特？我没去那里 我只记得我把他当沙包打

translation.en: ...is smacking him around whenever I wanted to...
translation.zh: 我只记得我把他当沙包打

translation.en: ...and him not doing a single thing about it.
Yeah, we had a lot of good times like that growing up.
translation.zh: 对，我们以前玩得很开心

translation.en: Why is your voice so shaky, Daddy? Are you crying?
translation.zh: 爸，你声音在抖，你哭了吗？

translation.en: -You don't stop talking, do you? -Honey, we should be getting going.
translation.zh: 你这个儿童广播电台 -宝贝，该走了-好

translation.en: Sure, baby.
I want you to stop making up lies about kicking my ass...
translation.zh: 别再乱说你要扁我否则我给你好看

translation.en: -...or I'm gonna have to set you straight. -Sure, sure, sure.
translation.zh: 别再乱说你要扁我否则我给你好看 没问题

translation.en: I'll see you around.
Becky, you be having great summer.
I was one inch away from knocking that guy out, and I swear to God.
-No, you weren't. -This is grown-up talk, so butt out!
translation.zh: 才怪 大人讲话，小孩闭嘴

translation.en: That's insane! What did you say to him?
translation.zh: （冰淇淋屋）太夸张了 你跟他说什么？

translation.en: I said, "Hey, Cavanaugh, you speak to me like that again...
translation.zh: 我说"卡瓦纳在我家人面前乱讲话"

translation.en: ...in front of my wife and kid, I will brush your teeth with a brick."
translation.zh: 我说"卡瓦纳在我家人面前乱讲话" "小心我让你唉爸叫母"

translation.en: No, you didn't. You just yelled at me.
-I don't yell at you! -Calm down.
No, I'm just saying. You guys were in the bathroom.
Look who's here, everybody.
Twenty Voss waters, right? -That's how they do it in Hollyweird. -I don't know.
translation.zh: 点20瓶矿泉水？好莱坞的人都那样

translation.en: We haven't lived there in, what, 10 months now or something?
translation.zh: 不知道，我们十个月没住那里了

translation.en: As a matter of fact, our son starts work here tonight.
translation.zh: 我们儿子今晚开始在这里打工

translation.en: I know. I heard you brown-nosed Mr. Pappas, and now Showbiz Junior's got a job.
translation.zh: 我知道，我听说你跟老板拍马屁 让你儿子来这里打工

translation.en: I used to scoop cones here, and why shouldn't he? It's a great first job for a kid.
translation.zh: 我也在这里挖过冰淇淋让孩子在这里打工很不错

translation.en: Or lifetime job.
Okay, what are we having?
-Becky, what do you want, hon? -Can I have the soft chocolate cup, please?
translation.zh: 小贝，想吃什么？ 请给我巧克力霜淇淋

translation.en: Here's a word you probably never heard, no.
translation.zh: 你可能没听过这个回答：不行

translation.en: -The machine's busted, princess. -Bummer, it's broken? Like all your dreams?
translation.zh: 机器坏了，小公主 坏了？跟你的人生一样吗？

translation.en: It's easy to fix. I can help you with that.
translation.zh: 其实修理很简单，我帮你

translation.en: What do you know about fixing ice-cream machines, Higgins?
translation.zh: 你会修霜淇淋机吗，希金斯？

translation.en: I went to DeVry for a year.
translation.zh: 我在公司干过一年这个

translation.en: -That's right. -I can fix anything with a plug.
translation.zh: -对耶-有插头的东西我都会修

translation.en: Including your hair?
That's not true. I don't even know how that got started.
People are saying that around town. I'll walk you through it.
translation.zh: 传得跟真的一样 我教你，爬上去，攀到后面

translation.en: Just walk up, climb up the machine, lean over the back.
translation.zh: 我教你，爬上去，攀到后面

translation.en: -Can't believe I'm listening to this idiot. -Listen to the man.
translation.zh: -我竟然听这白痴指挥-听他的啦

translation.en: You're gonna see two pipes coming into the top.
translation.zh: 你会看到上面有两根管子

translation.en: -Yes. -In between them...
translation.zh: 管子中间有个银色按钮

translation.en: ...there's gonna be a silver button. Hit it a little bit. Push hard.
translation.zh: 管子中间有个银色按钮 按下去，用力

translation.en: -Here? -Hit it with your fist.
Yeah, just push the button.
-I got it. -There we go!
I think we're getting somewhere. Okay, keep going. Yeah, that...
Force it. That's it.
Hey! Why is Dickie crapping all over the ice cream stand?
translation.zh: 迪克怎么在霜淇淋机上拉屎？

translation.en: What'd she say? -Nothing! Nothing! -Go! Just go!
That's where ice cream comes from?
translation.zh: 原来霜淇淋是这样来的

translation.en: And so we've reached the end of another school year.
translation.zh: 我们又到了 本学年最后一天

translation.en: Froot Loop?
Ten months of learning, growth...
...and, yes, hopefully, a little bit of fun.
But the journey we began together, in September, does not end today...
translation.zh: 去年九月开始的旅程 不是在今天结束

translation.en: ...for education is a process...
...that does not begin and end on some set schedule....
translation.zh: 没有固定的起点与终点

translation.en: Please let me finish. Return to your seats.
Damn you! Every year, you do this to me!
And this was my favorite shirt from when I was 12!
translation.zh: 这是我12岁时最爱的衣服

translation.en: How you doing, sophomore?
-Not bad, sophomore. -Come here!
translation.zh: 不错，二年级生 过来

translation.en: Hey, you're not a statue.
You're an ass-tue.
-Doesn't even make any sense. -Shut up!
translation.zh: 这一点不好笑 少啰唆

translation.en: What?! What?! What?!
Nothing! Nothing! Nothing!
What's up, man?
Your dad picking you up?
I don't know.
I told him it'd be cool if he stayed late at the soup kitchen, so it's on me.
translation.zh: 我说他当义工可以待晚一点我得自己回家

translation.en: Well, you can come on the bus with us, if you want.
No, how about we do something fun?
How about we do something we're not supposed to?
"Keep out."
translation.zh: （危险勿入） 勿入，这样我更想进去

translation.en: That just makes me want to not keep out.
Heard our dads used to come swimming here back in the day.
translation.zh: 听说爸爸他们以前常来这里游泳

translation.en: They claim to be all squeaky clean, but I think they were nuts.
translation.zh: 他们说自己多乖，我看是鬼扯

translation.en: College kids. We better go.
No go.
Stay.
He's nuts.
Let's go.
Hey! Where are you guys going?
Join the party.
Here. One and two.
Are you guys freshmen?
No. We're seniors. We just became seniors, like, 20 minutes ago.
translation.zh: 四年级，20分钟前才升上来的

translation.en: Not high school seniors, college seniors.
Wait a minute!
I remember you guys.
You're Scully.
You're Boomer.
Come here. I love you guys so much.
-I love you, too. -Girl, I love you more.
I'm gonna go.
Body shots!
No go. Stay.
Okay, okay. But what about these beers, man?
translation.zh: 啤酒怎么办？不喝的话会被怀疑

translation.en: If we don't drink them, they'll be onto us, and I'm not sure I'm ready for beer yet.
translation.zh: 啤酒怎么办？不喝的话会被怀疑 我还没准备开始喝啤酒

translation.en: Wait, let's just dump them when no one's looking...
translation.zh: 我们偷偷倒掉，假装喝醉

translation.en: -...then act like we're drunk. -Okay. Good idea.
translation.zh: 我们偷偷倒掉，假装喝醉 好，这招不错

translation.en: Let's go.
Summertime.
Sure you want to do this, big man? No shame in backing down.
translation.zh: 真的要跳吗？现在后悔还来得及

translation.en: -Really? -Come on!
-Come on. -It's a lifelong shame.
translation.zh: -是吗？-拜托 这是奇耻大辱

translation.en: -You're finally doing Suicide 35. It's a big day. -What are you scared of, man?
translation.zh: 你终于要跳自杀崖了，这很重要 怕什么？阿鲁巴你都玩过了

translation.en: You're the "rope from the tree, triple flip, bird-crush" guy.
translation.zh: 怕什么？阿鲁巴你都玩过了

translation.en: I'm not scared of this. In the past, I did it before.
translation.zh: 我不怕，我在别的地方跳过

translation.en: -But I'll do it right now. -Sure. Sure. Go ahead.
translation.zh: 现在我要跳了 -跳，跳吧-跳吧

translation.en: Do it. Do it.
But the thing is this, I just.... I ate about 45 minutes ago.
translation.zh: 可是我刚刚才吃过东西

translation.en: What did you eat?
I had chicken chow mein.
Chicken chow mein? When did--? We were with you the whole time!
translation.zh: 鸡肉炒面？我们一直在你旁边啊

translation.en: -Yeah. You didn't see it? They had it at Kmart. -Get out of here.
-It's good there. Yeah. -It's very good.
What do I hear right now?
Look at this.
Beers on ice. Hot ladies everywhere.
translation.zh: 冰啤酒 乳波臀浪，我们以前也是这样

translation.en: This is how we used to do it.
translation.zh: 乳波臀浪，我们以前也是这样

translation.en: -This is how I still do it, buddy. -He does still do it that way.
Well, you should stop.
This is Kappa Eta Sigma property.
translation.zh: 这是卡趴稀马兄弟会的地盘

translation.en: So you might want to quit perving on our ladies... ...and get back to your trailer homes.
translation.zh: 别想吃天鹅肉，滚回癞蛤蟆窝吧

translation.en: Okay, easy there, Abercrombie.
I think it's.... I think we've been around a little longer than you.
translation.zh: 这里我们混得比你们久

translation.en: Been swimming here since we were 8 years old...
translation.zh: 我们八岁就在这游泳，冷静点

translation.en: -...so you can calm down a little bit. -I'm sure it was the bomb!
translation.zh: 我们八岁就在这游泳，冷静点 真了不起

translation.en: Cranking your Al Jolson tunes on your transistor radio.
translation.zh: 你们还在用收音机听艾尔乔森的歌吗？

translation.en: But it's the 21st century now, and Thicky-Thick and the Flabby Bunch...
translation.zh: 现在都21世纪了 各位大叔不该再脱衣服卖猪肉

translation.en: ...should never take their shirts off again.
translation.zh: 各位大叔不该再脱衣服卖猪肉

translation.en: -That hurts. -Okay, I guess I'm Thicky-Thick.
Yeah. I don't like being in the Flabby Bunch, either.
translation.zh: 我也不喜欢被人叫大叔

translation.en: Boom! That just happened.
translation.zh: 砰！ 不然你们要怎样

translation.en: I haven't been around this many arrogant white college kids... ...since Eminem played Duke.
translation.zh: 没想到"大学生了没"跑来出外景

translation.en: There it goes. And then... Boom! That just happened. How was that?
translation.zh: 这招不错 砰！ 不然你们要怎样？

translation.en: At least we got into college, skinny Danny Glover.
translation.zh: 至少我们上了大学，瘦版奥巴马

translation.en: -Long handjob. -That's Rock, Paper, Scissors.
I think it's over.
-Hey, hey, hey! -What, what, what? What?
And a little extra right there.
Hey, fellows, that was a good handshake. We got a good one, too. It goes like this.
translation.zh: 那样握手很酷我们也不赖，就像这样

translation.en: -Okay, here we go. -How you doing, sir?
Very good, sir. Beautiful day.
At least we're not stuck in some crap town like this, hanging up drywall for the rest of our lives.
translation.zh: 至少我们没困在这鸟地方一辈子混吃等死

translation.en: Hanging drywall? First of all, I'll have you know that I own, pretty much...
translation.zh: 混吃等死？ 首先，我有一间超赞的修车厂

translation.en: ...the greatest auto-body shop in town, all right?
translation.zh: 首先，我有一间超赞的修车厂

translation.en: This guy works for the cable company.
Free cable for life. What?
Over here, you know Higgins? That's right, he works part-time down at the go-kart track.
translation.zh: 认识希金斯吗？他在小型赛车场兼差

translation.en: So he was highballing you with the drywall.
translation.zh: 所以说混吃等死还抬举你们

translation.en: This just got real.
-Real stupid? What happened? -Something's real.
Are you guys as wasted as us?
translation.zh: 你们跟我们一样喝醉了吗？

translation.en: Hells, yeah! All the time!
Yo, we're gonna let you guys continue your Klan meeting in a minute.
translation.zh: 我们马上让你们继续活动

translation.en: He's just gonna jump off of here, and then we'll leave.
translation.zh: 等他跳下去我们就闪人

translation.en: I can't permit that.
I can't permit it!
Can't permit it.
You guys have ruined our celebration by being here.
translation.zh: 你们跑来破坏我们的活动

translation.en: Look at my hands, huh?
They're shaking, I'm so mad.
Yeah, look, my brother's shaking.
-That was a cool move. -Listen to me.
I'm gonna kick this kid's ass.
But I need, like, 11 to 15 minutes to stretch out, okay?
-I got to stretch. It's overlooked. -No, I understand.
I can't fight these kids. I'm skinny Danny Glover.
translation.zh: 我不能打他们，我是瘦版奥巴马

translation.en: Guys, this guy's doing 11 flips behind you for some unknown reason.
We got kids, we can't afford to do this.
Buddy, dude, you don't have to do that last flip. Don't, like, get hurt.
-We'll come back another time. -You will come back never!
translation.zh: 我们改天再来 永远都不能来

translation.en: This is Kappa Eta Sigma property!
Dude, why are you acting so crazy?
Did Betty White just call you crazy?
translation.zh: 贝蒂怀特说"你发神经了"

translation.en: -He called you Betty White. That's funny. -Betty White?
translation.zh: 他叫你贝蒂怀特？这个好笑

translation.en: We've got a situation!
You know what? Hey, guys? Guys?
-Hey, what's up, guys? -Let's get out of here. It's nice to meet everybody.
-We're gonna take off, but let's do this again. -Take care, guys.
-Enjoy yourself. -Not that way.
Is there an elevator?
That way.
Come on, are you serious? You gonna make us jump?
translation.zh: 不会吧？你要我们跳下去？

translation.en: Naked.
Asshole.
You guys are losers.
Don't worry, it gets bigger.
That poor old lady!
I'm paralyzed! I'm in so much pain!
Mama!
No!
I was inside you!
I can't believe nobody's even scared of a black guy anymore!
translation.zh: 现在竟然没人怕黑人了

translation.en: Damn you, Obama!
What the hell just happened?
I saw my dad's dick.
Well, the good news is Lamonsoff finally did the jump for real.
And the bad news is he landed on my face.
What are you, made of rocks, dude?
Check this out, feel this. I'm not kidding you. Right up here.
-I think even higher. Feel that. -And?
Put your hand right there.
Feel the other one. Those are my balls.
I'm not kidding you, they went way up in there. You're getting me turned on.
translation.zh: -真的跑上来了-你害我硬起来了

translation.en: -Are you kidding me? -What?
They slashed our tires! These kids won't stop abusing us!
translation.zh: 他们刺破轮胎，这些小子真嚣张

translation.en: Damn you!
This wasn't college kids.
It was my son, Satan.
And why is this kid so angry?
His mom hiccupped a lot, but she was happy, and hot.
translation.zh: 他妈常打嗝，可是很快乐，又超辣

translation.en: If she's so hot... ...why don't you make her your late-night booty call?
translation.zh: 既然她这么辣，去找她打炮啊

translation.en: Beefcakes, come on, baby!
You've been sneaking around with Fabio?
translation.zh: 原来你偷偷搞上金刚芭比？

translation.en: It's not funny, dude! She's gonna kick the crap out of me later!
-A little 5-hour Energy, huh? -Yeah.
500-hour Energy?
I drink it for the taste, okay?
Oh, my God, you gonna jog to Florida after this?
No!
Bonus!
Come on, just cram yourself in there.
My body, it's just too big for this thing. I can't fit.
Higgins, dummy, hop in this thing for a minute.
-For what? -Just get in the tire.
-No way! In there? -Five yards, we'll roll you.
We've done it. I would do it if I could get in there.
translation.zh: 挤得进去的话我也想玩

translation.en: This is peer pressure, you're bullying.
And I promise you I'll stop you and I love you.
Don't let him do it. He's jacked up on juice.
translation.zh: 别让他滚，他喝了很多蛮牛

translation.en: And a-one, and a-two...
-Mommy's got you. -...and a-three!
-Okay, five feet. Grab me. -Hello.
-Lenny! -Hey, Keithie.
Meet me at the football field, but don't tell your mother.
Why am I still rolling?
Lenny!
Help!
Guys, get me!
-Hang in there! -I'm going downhill!
Lenny! No!
When will it end?
Yeah. Summer is here, man!
Help! Stop! No!
-Tire on the loose! -Fluzoo, shotgun, now!
Someone!
Higgins is in the tire!
Of course.
-Help! -Get there!
Help!
-Liar! -No, no, baby!
No! Someone!
Show's over, tire.
I'm next.
-I got next! -No, I'm next!
-It's my tire! My turn! -Hey!
What happened?
I got a phone call.
Okay. I forgive you. Was it long-distance or something?
Don't want to kick a guy while he's down, Higgins...
...but we caught your son with a can of spray paint... ...looking like he was up to no good.
translation.zh: 我们逮到你儿子拿喷漆，不安好心

translation.en: You lied about the soup. You lied about the soup!
We are gonna find those fartheads...
translation.zh: 我们... 要找到那些猪头

translation.en: ...and we are gonna kill them.
Kill!
Kill! Kill! Kill!
No, guys! Not each other!
We're not killing each other!
K-E-I-T...
Keithie, Keithie, Keithie!
It's a practice, Donna. You don't have to go full speed.
translation.zh: 唐娜，练习不必这么用力

translation.en: -Sorry, Mr. Feder. -Fine.
translation.zh: 抱歉，费德先生 没关系

translation.en: Hey, look at these giant mooses out there.
You don't want to get in the middle of all that.
Plus, the kicker, honestly, is like, one of the most important guys on the team...
translation.zh: 而且踢球员是队上最重要的人

translation.en: ...and you don't have to worry about getting your head bashed in every play.
I get it, Dad. I'm a wimp. You're not a wimp. It's just common sense.
Avoid big idiots trying to hurt you.
translation.zh: 这是基本，避开想伤害你的大块头

translation.en: I was trying to avoid a big idiot trying to hurt me on the bus this morning...
translation.zh: 早上我在校车上想避开一个大个子

translation.en: ...but he wouldn't leave me alone.
Well, sometimes they won't let you avoid them... ...and you just-- You can't back down in those situations.
translation.zh: 如果他们故意惹你，就不能退缩

translation.en: I'm telling you, I've backed down a few times, it's not a good feeling.
translation.zh: 我退缩过几次，感觉很差

translation.en: All right, look, let's just kick a few field goals. It's like soccer, which you're great at.
translation.zh: 踢几球来射门得分跟你擅长的足球很像

translation.en: All you got to do is put your foot right through the ball.
What?
Touchdown! Yeah! Yeah!
That's ridiculous! Your first try?
All right, we're backing up, boy.
That was totally awesome, Keithie! That was so cool!
That was just, like, awesome!
Okay, drive through the ball. Drive through the ball.
It's up!
Yeah! Go, Keithie!
Yes! What did you eat this morning?
translation.zh: 帅啊 你早餐吃了什么？

translation.en: All right, this is starting to get into, like, college level.
From the 30!
Who the hell is this kid?
Oh, my God!
Stop, Keithie time
I'm starting to think she has a little crush on you.
translation.zh: 我想她好像对你有感觉了

translation.en: Really?
Either that or she got bit by a poisonous spider.
translation.zh: 不然就是她塑化剂吃多了

translation.en: Keithie!
All right, let's see how you do in a real game situation, though.
translation.zh: 现在看比赛时你表现如何

translation.en: Okay? Let's pretend I'm a linebacker... ...and I'm gonna come at you and try and block it.
translation.zh: 假装我是后卫，我跑来阻挡你

translation.en: -Okay. -Set!
Hike! I'm a crazy linebacker! Give me that football!
translation.zh: 开始！我是疯狂后卫，球给我

translation.en: My leg!
Keithie!
Don't tell your mother!
All right, that kid's dead. Back to work.
Now, you remember how to do a five-point turn, right?
Yeah.
-Parallel park? -Yeah, yeah.
Hey, don't "yeah, yeah" me, dumbass.
You're precious cargo.
Now, if you mess around and get yourself killed, I'm gonna have to kill you.
translation.zh: 你要是不小心开车，我会宰了你

translation.en: Look, Dad, I'm ready for this, all right?
You're late.
Hello, McKenzie.
Hey, Wiley, how you feeling?
Just two years of this.
And I still only have 40 percent feeling in my body.
Otherwise, I'm fine.
No, Rihanna's fine. You just teach driver's ed.
translation.zh: 不，蕾哈娜才很好你只是驾训班教练

translation.en: Get her done, son! And remember everything we talked about!
translation.zh: 好好表现，儿子 记得我们讲过的

translation.en: Defensive driving! Stop at all yellows! Obey the laws!
translation.zh: 小心开车，黄灯停车，遵守规则

translation.en: -You moron! -Look out!
Be safe! Don't do what I just did!
Hey, officers, you guys want to stick around and have a drink with me, hang out a little bit?
translation.zh: 警官，想留下来喝一杯吗？

translation.en: You're afraid of us leaving you alone with your son, aren't you?
My son. Are you kidding me? I don't care-- He's got a knife!
translation.zh: 开玩笑，我才不... 他有刀子

translation.en: That sounds dangerous. How far was the drop?
translation.zh: 听起来好危险，悬崖有多高？

translation.en: Just 35 feet.
Who do you think you are? Tarzan?
-It's no big deal. -Honey?
Hi. Sally.
Hi, honey. I-- No, I just came to see if Mommy was alive.
translation.zh: 老婆，我来看妈是不是活着

translation.en: And looking now, she's breathing, she's good. Hi. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 她还在呼吸，很好 你怎么来了？

translation.en: I was bringing your mother a new fan for the summer.
-That's good. -You said you couldn't...
translation.zh: 真好 你说不能跟我喝咖啡

translation.en: ...get coffee with me because you had a 3:30 appointment with a Mr. Renaldo.
translation.zh: 你说不能跟我喝咖啡 因为三点半跟雷纳多先生有约

translation.en: -Hello, ladies! -You!
translation.zh: 哈啰，小姐 你，不会吧

translation.en: -Can't be! -We killed you last week.
translation.zh: 你，不会吧 我们上星期才杀了你

translation.en: You actually think two amateurish nitwits could kill the great Renaldo?
translation.zh: 你们以为两个业余的傻瓜 真能杀死雷纳多吗？

translation.en: -I told you. -You did. You called it.
So the leg's not really broken, huh?
No, it is broken, right here.
Just a hairline fracture, though.
No, it's a clean break.
-Slight, though. -Slight? No. It's broken.
translation.zh: 可是很轻微 轻微？不，骨折

translation.en: "Broken" broken or just broken?
translation.zh: 严重骨折还是普通骨折？

translation.en: It's a broken leg.
What was once one bone is now two half-bones.
Right.
Is there anything you can do about my wife staring at me?
translation.zh: 我老婆狠狠瞪着我 你有办法帮忙吗？

translation.en: No, I'm not a psychiatrist.
translation.zh: 没有，我不是精神科医师

translation.en: -So you're saying my wife is crazy? -No, no. I was joking.
translation.zh: 你是说我老婆发疯了吗？ 不，我开玩笑的

translation.en: Like you were when you said his leg is broken.
translation.zh: 就像你说他腿断了一样

translation.en: Look, your son is going to be wearing that cast the entire summer.
translation.zh: 听好，你的儿子整个暑假都要上石膏

translation.en: If you don't mind, I haven't slept in 68 hours.
translation.zh: 不好意思，我68小时没睡了

translation.en: So you're a little loopy from lack of sleep, and that really isn't my son's bone.
translation.zh: 如果你睡眠不足那个就不是我儿子的骨头

translation.en: That's a piece of celery you snapped.
The leg is broken!
You can't undo this.
And you lied to me, so you're gonna pay for it.
translation.zh: 别想装没事，你骗了我 你要付出代价

translation.en: Doctor, wouldn't it be nice if there was a cure for anger?
translation.zh: 医生，火冒三丈有解药吗？

translation.en: There is. It's called Jack Daniel's.
-Another one of your jokes, huh? -I wish.
translation.zh: 这又是你的玩笑话吗？ 我也希望

translation.en: Okay, the light is red now, so just remain stopped.
Scully, is that you?
Scully!
Hey, what's up, fellas?
Are you taking your driver's test drunk?
Yeah, I'm MC Hammered!
-You're a madman! -Hey, Scully, Scully.
Have you seen those old townies from the quarry today?
translation.zh: 史格利，有看到 悬崖上那些大叔吗？

translation.en: No, I can't say I did. Why?
They disrespected our frat house!
-Man, they disrespected the crap out of it! -No, can't have that.
translation.zh: 砸得面目全非 太可恶了

translation.en: Brewski time, dude!
It's not for you, Scully.
It's for that freak in the hat next to you. Looks like he needs it.
translation.zh: 给你旁边那怪叔叔的 他好像需要喝一点

translation.en: -Boom! -Yeah! That just happened!
Kill! Kill! Kill!
Taking your driver's test while intoxicated?
Minus five points.
This is ridiculous! I've wasted an entire day waiting for this idiot to show up.
translation.zh: 太扯了，我浪费一整天等那个白痴出现

translation.en: Did you tell him your son-in-law works for the cable company?
translation.zh: 你有说你女婿 在他们公司上班吗？

translation.en: A fat lot of good being related to that bozo would do me.
translation.zh: 跟那痞子有亲戚关系也没用

translation.en: I'm gonna run to the bathroom.
Love to the children.
Yes. Yes.
Damn it, I just sat down.
I'll be right out there! Hang on!
I'm coming as quick as I can. I got bunions, damn it!
translation.zh: 我尽快出来了 我脚不方便

translation.en: No! No!
You burn in hell!
You cable-installing mother-- Damn it!
translation.zh: 该死的第四台 讨厌

translation.en: Look, man, I know deadbeat dads always have lame excuses... ...why they don't see their kids.
translation.zh: 烂父亲不看小孩的借口很多

translation.en: But "I didn't know you existed till about a week ago"...
translation.zh: 可是我一周前才知道有你

translation.en: ...is actually a fantastic excuse, so can you cut me some slack?
translation.zh: 这理由其实不错 所以你能原谅我吗？

translation.en: Her name's not Hiccups McGee.
Yeah, I know that.
-So why do you call her that? -No, that's just-- It's stupid.
translation.zh: 那你干嘛那样叫她？ 无聊嘛，那是我帮人取的绰号

translation.en: It's just kind of a nickname I give people that...
translation.zh: 无聊嘛，那是我帮人取的绰号

translation.en: ...you know, have a distinct trait or physical feature.
Like, if someone had big lips, you'd call them Lippy McGee.
translation.zh: 代表一个人的特色 嘴唇很厚就叫厚唇鸡

translation.en: And if they sneezed a lot, you'd call them Sneezy McGee.
So you'd be Ugly McGee.
I'd be Ugly McGee. Exactly.
-Shorty McGee. -Shorty McGee, sure.
-Viagra McGee. -Right, right. You get it, you get it.
Listen, man, I'm willing to give this a try if you are.
translation.zh: 如果你愿意，我们可以试试

translation.en: You know what they say: Yesterday's history, tomorrow's a mystery.
translation.zh: 俗话说往事已矣，来日可追

translation.en: Maybe we go inside and search the Internet for funny videos of squirrels waterskiing.
translation.zh: 我们去网上搜寻松鼠滑水的影片

translation.en: Okay, we're getting somewhere.
I'm sorry I lied about the appointment.
The lying is not the worst part.
You hid from me at your mother's house, Eric. Who does that?
translation.zh: 你在你妈家躲我，哪有人这样？

translation.en: Look, she's nice to me.
You know, she always takes my side...
...worries if I'm eating enough and taking my vitamins.

translation.en: I do all that stuff, too, Eric.
Okay, I don't.

...and I'm always running around, the kids, and I guess I leave you out a lot.

And I'm totally fine with that.
As long as he was gay, dead or a cartoon.

translation.en: -Gay. -Okay.
But no matter who or what we look at, we'll always come back to each other, right?

translation.en: -Car wash! -Car wash!

translation.en: -Support our team! -I'll prove it to you!
-What are you doing? -No, no, you're gonna like this.
Hi, girls!

-Honey, you don't have to do this. -I want to.
Hi, girls!
Wash it up extra soapy!
You got it.
Wait, hang on. There's a car just in front of you. Better do them first.

translation.en: Yo, got a customer! You take these guys, we'll take the yellow car.

translation.en: Extra soapy.
What is happening right now?
I swear, I didn't plan this.
No, no, no. Thank you. I'm good. I'm good, thank you.
Well, I might as well enjoy this.
Why is this never-ending?
At least the guys in the car in front of us are having fun.

translation.en: What are you doing? Get in there! Let me do it.

translation.en: Okay, everybody.

translation.en: Sorry about the leg.
The good news is the children got through another year of school. Fabulously.

translation.en: You got older, even though I told you not to, especially you.

translation.en: Stay young. Don't leave me.
You prepared us your famous chicken à la food poisoning...

translation.en: ...which we're all excited to eat. I'm just kidding.
translation.zh: 你做了美味的臭酸鸡我们都很期待 开玩笑的

translation.en: But the greatest thing is, it's my favorite part of the day with my four best friends.

translation.en: -To the Feders! -Yeah!
So Bumpty asked me out for ice cream today.
I "went out for ice cream" once with your dad.

translation.en: This is the best vanilla pudding I've ever had.

Here you go.
-Hey. -Want me to come in and feed it to you...

translation.en: ...like I did the last time?

translation.en: No, no. I got my kid here. That wouldn't be cool.
You said you loved me!
They're not all tens, buddy.
Homeboy, why aren't you eating?
I saw something today that made me lose my appetite.

translation.en: What was it, me naked?
What?
What's a burpsmart?
-Burpsnorp? -A burpsnart!
Basically, he burps, sneezes and farts at the same time.

translation.en: He goes:
I think I just shat myself.
Hey, honey, what time is that Feder bash tonight?

translation.en: What? It's paint. It doesn't come off.
I thought it might be fun to have a theme, no?
-A theme? -Roxanne decided the theme is....

translation.en: The '80s?
The '80s?
The '80s? That was 70 years ago.
-I thought we could go as Hall & Oates. -Hall & Oates?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah. What is that, like a cereal?

translation.en: No.
Why don't you ask Nancy Arbuckle to come by for the get-together?

What's up, player? I'm here for your daughter.
What?

You have brain damage?
I think we both know what time it is, don't we?

Help me out here.

I ain't no boy with a mind you can toy...

Bruce Springsteen, Born in the U.S.A.

No, no.

You got it. I'll pull the string.
Like a raft out of hell

Don't ever say the party's over!
That didn't happen.

Come on, you're my one and only, sweetie-boo-mo-mo.

So bulgy.
Like a big caramel apple.
I'm scared. I feel safe with you.

translation.en: Shut up.
You know, I can make a connection with a woman.
I just can't sustain it.
You know, there's a distance there.
Try to fill it up pharmaceutically, you know, with pills...
...or the Discovery Channel, or Dino Nuggets.

translation.en: But nothing really works.
See, you understand, you know, because you're, I heard...

translation.en: ...sensitive to men.
God, he's hot!
Zip it! He'll find out our secret!
translation.zh: 闭嘴，他会发现我们的秘密

translation.en: -Drink up, partner. -Yeah!
-Lenny. -Secret table.
Yes, honey, how are you? What's going on?
We just trying to get our punch on.
Becky's sleepy. She wants her daddy to put her to bed.

translation.en: Well, you wouldn't want to have too much punch with all these kids running around.

translation.en: -You know what, I'd be okay with that. -Actually, you wouldn't.

translation.en: Close your eyes.
Yeah, mom.
As easy as making a free throw.
Hey, Bean, Becky went to sleep.
I think it's time for you to hit it, pal. What do you say?
No, no, don't touch that. Yeah, you might break it.
What--? Where did you learn how to do that?
I saw it in one of my dreams.
You're a genius?
My boy's a genius.
Your dad's also a genius.
Sweet dreams there, angel, okay?
Daddy, can you lay in bed with me till I fall asleep?
What do you mean? I thought you are sleepy. That's why we came up here.

translation.en: Please lay down.
I'll lay down with you, then. I just-- There's a party going on, but....

Look who was in the neighborhood!
Some of Lenny's friends from the old J. Geils Band!

No.
I thought you liked this stuff. Sorry.
All right. I'll tell you a story.
Once upon a time, there was a hand...

Sleep!
Slee....
Sleep!
Boy, Feder's cranking his old rock 'n' roll records pretty loud.

translation.en: Guess he's never heard of neighbors.

...if you would stop trying to "manage" me.
Word, word.

translation.en: Yo, don't believe the hype.
Boy!

translation.en: Doing leg lifts. I work out when I can, you know?

Why is this empty? -Where is Gigglesworth? -Hey, hey.
I'm sorry, man. Were you looking for this?
-Why does he look good? -I sewed him.

Gay camp.

translation.en: I learned to sew from my dad, who was a tailor.
translation.zh: 我跟我爸学的，他是裁缝师

translation.en: I've been sewing since I was Becky's age. Here.
translation.zh: 我像小贝这么大就会缝衣服

translation.en: This is great.
Gigglesworth's okay, you're not fooling around with my wife...
translation.zh: 孙小空没事 你没跟我老婆乱搞

translation.en: ...and you got a pee stain.
That is not mine.
You're an animal.
I am the law!
Can you dig it?
Come on, big man, Lenny's got, like, 12 bathrooms.
translation.zh: 大块头，雷尼家有很多间厕所

translation.en: I don't got to go to the bathroom. I'm just enjoying the water.
translation.zh: 不必上厕所，我想泡泡水

translation.en: -Get out. -Hurry! Hurry!
Fluzoo, come on!
That's not even warm. It's hot.
I got to give it to your old man for one thing. He could always throw a party.
translation.zh: 我实在要称赞你老爸 他办的派对都超级赞

translation.en: This is my dad's party?
Check out your girlfriend in the Pat Benatar outfit.
translation.zh: 你马子打扮成佩特班娜塔

translation.en: Charlotte, that was amazing. Where'd you learn to sing like that?
translation.zh: 夏洛蒂，太棒了，你去哪学唱歌？

translation.en: No place. I just sing a little in the shower.
translation.zh: 没有，我只在洗澡时才唱

translation.en: Maybe you should stick to the shower.
Because I gots the power I'm on Today show dissing Matt Lauer
translation.zh: 因为有这能力 今天我在这里表现 嘲讽一下马特劳厄尔

translation.en: Bumpty, do me a favor and shut your mouth before I slap that Mohawk into a chin strap.
translation.zh: 帮提 给我闭嘴，不然我赏你两耳光

translation.en: -What? -What?
Who invited you guys?
Your beautiful wife does.
Well, she invited her, and naturally we assumed it was a plus one.
translation.zh: 她邀她来，我自然就陪她来

translation.en: -There a problem? -No, I was gonna say, great Terminator outfit...
translation.zh: 有问题吗？ 没有，你扮终结者很像

translation.en: ...and Robert Palmer thing you got on and--
translation.zh: 没有，你扮终结者很像 你这身打扮很美

translation.en: Nice babble.
How about this?
What about that? Does that hurt? Is that hurting you?
translation.zh: -这样呢？这样呢？-不 会痛吗？

translation.en: -Yes, it is hurting me. -Okay. Well, let me do it some more.
translation.zh: 会痛 好，那我多弄几下

translation.en: You got something to say?
Actually, Cavanaugh.
You want to stay at my party, I think you owe me an apology.
translation.zh: 你如果想留下来，就跟我道歉

translation.en: -For what? -For back in the day, always giving me crap.
translation.zh: 为什么？ 你以前老爱欺负我

translation.en: You don't want to let bygones be bygones?
translation.zh: 不想让恩怨一笔勾消吗？

translation.en: I do. After you apologize to me.
For stuff I did 30 years ago?
There isn't a statute of limitations on being a dick.
-What'd you just say? -I said what I said.
translation.zh: 你说什么？ 你听到了，我们来单挑

translation.en: You and me are fighting right now. Now, let's go! Let's get it over with.
translation.zh: 你听到了，我们来单挑 来啊，帐一次算清

translation.en: Man, looks like our friend's about to die.
Lenny, what's going on? I'm calling the police!
We're already here.
Hold my hair, woman. You ready for this?
translation.zh: 拿着我的头发 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Not at all, but I'm gonna do this, because I got to show my son what's right.
translation.zh: 没有，但我要让儿子知道是非对错

translation.en: -We'd do anything for our boys, wouldn't we? -Absolutely.
translation.zh: 我们为了儿子什么都肯做 没错

translation.en: Yeah. My boy's over in Afghanistan.
Well, you raised him right. I hope he gets home safe soon.
translation.zh: 你养了个好儿子 希望他早日平安回家

translation.en: Yeah, me, too.
Sucker-punch him, Feder.
Lick his bicep. Lick it, bite it, lick the tan off.
translation.zh: 舔他二头肌，把他古铜色皮肤咬掉

translation.en: All right, here's what's gonna happen.
Hit me right on the chin. I'll go down like a sack of potatoes.
translation.zh: 打我下巴，我会突然倒地

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -Just do it.
I know you'd do the same for me if my boy was watching.
translation.zh: 如果我儿子在看，你也会帮我

translation.en: Let's get busy, Hollywood!
No! Don't hit me, please!
I'm sorry. Please don't hit me. You would tear me limb from limb.
translation.zh: 对不起，别打我，我会断手断脚

translation.en: Open this. The only reason I picked on you was because I was afraid of you.
translation.zh: 松手 我欺负你是因为怕你

translation.en: -What? -Oh, my God.
Please, please, please. Just go with it.
I didn't think anyone would believe you could knock me out.
translation.zh: 继续演下去，没人相信你能打倒我

translation.en: Please. Don't hit me.
-Cavanaugh's crying. This is ridiculous! -Cavanaugh.
translation.zh: 卡瓦纳哭了，太扯了 卡瓦纳

translation.en: -You mean you don't want me to hit you with this? -No! Please.
translation.zh: 你不要我用拳头揍你？ 不要，拜托

translation.en: Or the elbow?
Finger in the eye!
-Wow. -Listen to this guy.
All right, get up. Straighten up.
I'm not gonna hit you, but if you ever disrespect me...
translation.zh: 我不打你 可是如果 你再惹到我或别人

translation.en: ...or anybody...
...I will hunt you down, and I will slap you into a pile of tattoos...
translation.zh: 我会逮到你 把你打到只剩下一堆刺青...

translation.en: ...bad breath...
...and back zits.
Oh, please.
Do you understand me?
Yes, I understand you.
Do you understand me?!
Yes, I understand you!
Then walk away before I change my mind.
Thank you very much.
-Hey, man, look at him! -What just happened?
Lenny! Lenny! Lenny!
Oh, my God, that was the manliest thing you ever did.
translation.zh: 天啊，今天是你最男人的一天

translation.en: You get extra special hip-hop dance tonight.
translation.zh: 晚上给你特别服务一下

translation.en: Word up.
Hey, guys, if you see Leonard...
...could you tell him that I'm here waiting like we arranged?
translation.zh: 告诉他我照约定在这里等他

translation.en: Guys? Guys?
Yeah, okay. Okay, I am a person!
-That was awesome, by the way. -Had to. Had to.
Yeah, you had to.
-He let you off the hook, didn't he? -He did, he did, but I had to go with it.
translation.zh: -是他让你的吧？-没错 我只能陪他演下去

translation.en: I can't believe it! We hit the moron jackpot!
Everybody who needs a beating, conveniently together on one lawn.
translation.zh: 欠扁的人刚好都在这里

translation.en: -Who are they? -Brunson University frat guys.
translation.zh: -他们是谁？-布朗森大学兄弟会

translation.en: God, I hate white people.
Excuse me, why are you here? What's the matter?
translation.zh: 请问你们来干嘛，有事吗？

translation.en: I tell you what is the matter.
These old townies trashed our frat house!
translation.zh: 这些大叔砸了我们兄弟会

translation.en: And nobody treats our good-times headquarters with disrespect!
-Yeah! -Yeah!
They didn't do it.
Me do it.
Don't try and cover for him, Z-Dog!
-Who's Z-Dog? -We know they're trying to get back at us...
translation.zh: 金毛狗是谁？ 他们想报复我们逼他们在我们湖里全裸跳水

translation.en: ...for making them do the naked plunge in our swimming hole.
translation.zh: 他们想报复我们逼他们在我们湖里全裸跳水

translation.en: Your swimming hole? I've been swimming at the quarry since I was 8 years old.
translation.zh: 你们的湖？我八岁就在那里游泳了

translation.en: Apparently, everybody in this crap town...
...has been swimming there since they were 8 years old.
translation.zh: 每个人都从八岁就在那里游泳

translation.en: I guess nobody wants to leave this dump because they're too busy sucking!
translation.zh: 这边的人真没出息，没人想离开

translation.en: We'll finish later. -You promise? -I promise.
-Okay. -Hey, smart guy!
Lenny Feder left this town, moved to Hollywood, made big bucks...
translation.zh: 雷尼曾经搬去好莱坞，赚了大钱

translation.en: ...probably more money than all you brainiacs put together ever will.
translation.zh: 比你们所有人以后赚的还多

translation.en: But guess what? He came back here.
translation.zh: 可是你知道吗？ 他回来了

translation.en: Because this beautiful town is his home, and it always will be his home.
translation.zh: 因为这美丽的小镇是他的家 永远都是

translation.en: Well, that was just a moving testament to this community, bro!
translation.zh: 听了让人感动到想尿尿

translation.en: But we didn't come here to hear any lame speeches.
translation.zh: 但我们不是来听你们放屁

translation.en: We came here to kick some old, smelly ass!
Fellas, we may be old.
translation.zh: 小家伙们，就算我们老了

translation.en: We may be smelly.
We may have a penis.
But the only ones getting their ass kicked around here...
translation.zh: 不过这里会被痛扁的屁股

translation.en: ...is gonna be you spoiled...
...privileged, uppity, preppy D-bags.
You hear that?
Now, let's get busy!
Come on, son! You ain't tough!
translation.zh: 开打，儿子 你也不怎样啊

translation.en: Hit him! Yeah, Braden! Yeah! Damn!
translation.zh: 扁他 对，布雷登 好啊 -可恶-你讨打

translation.en: You want this?
Sir, please stop it!
That's not a sir! That's a woman!
My woman!
Come on, babe.
Oh, you're so hot.
No! Don't bust my face!
You saved me.
I will protect you for the rest of your life.
Okay, blow-dryer boy.
Oh, God, no!
No! No!
Having a good anniversary, babe?
Honey, the best.
I can't breathe. Choking me!
Yeah!
-We did it. We did it, man. -Yeah.
We make a good team.
Yeah. Yeah, that was fun.
Boomer. What's going on?
This!
You're a traitor, Boomer!
His name's not Boomer!
It's Gary.
It's Greg.
Oh. Greg.
Oh, my God! Did you see his head? He's got a-- He's bald!
I got a wild one! I got a wild one!
Noogie, noogie, noogie.
Nobody noogies my brother!
translation.zh: 谁都不能刮我兄弟头皮

translation.en: My brain! My brain!
BU!
Hey, man, I had that one.
I know you did, big brother.
-Get out of here! -Don't hit me!
Hey, hey, look who showed up.
translation.zh: 看看谁出现了，暮光小狼

translation.en: Flippy-boy. Yeah, you want to flip your way out of this?
translation.zh: 看看谁出现了，暮光小狼 你想闪人吗？

translation.en: Too slow, old man. Where you work out, Cinnabon?
translation.zh: 动作太慢了，你在老人院健身吗？

translation.en: Look who's back up, baby. I didn't know we were kicking. Give me a second to stretch.
translation.zh: 站起来了，原来还能用踢的让我拉筋一下

translation.en: We're gonna throw some legs, huh? You want to throw some legs, huh?
translation.zh: -好 -要秀无影脚吗？ 你要用脚踢？

translation.en: That just happened.
What, were you raised by ninjas?
Congratulations.
You won the fight. Here's your prize.
Thanks, little girl. It looks just like you.
translation.zh: 谢谢小美女，他长得跟你好像

translation.en: It's a monkey! Look at me.
I'm a stupid little monkey.
Good night.
Come on, guys! We got to get out!
Let's go!
Lenny! Baby. -Baby, are you all right? -I'm coming for you, Leonard!
translation.zh: -雷尼，你还好吗？-我来救你了，雷纳

translation.en: I'm here for you, Leonard. I'm here for you.
Who--? Who are you? It's your pretty, shiny Penny.
Oops, sorry, I kicked your barrette.
Sorry, honey.
You guys were Fuji and Tanaka out there.
This is just like high school.
Get drunk, get in a fight, wind up back at Lamonsoff's, eating eggs.
translation.zh: 喝酒打架，最后到艾瑞克家吃蛋

translation.en: Except for the drunk part, Mommy.
All you guys together brings back so many memories.
translation.zh: 你们在一起有好多回忆

translation.en: -Dickie, is this you and Lenny? -Let's see.
translation.zh: （雷尼，迪克） 迪克，这是你和雷尼吗？

translation.en: Yeah, me and Hollywood were best friends in kindergarten.
translation.zh: 我和他在幼稚园是兄弟

translation.en: -Yep. -What happened?
What do you mean, "What happened?" We were in different classes.
translation.zh: 什么后来？后来没同班就疏远了

translation.en: -We kind of drifted apart, right? -Yeah. He was in those smart classes.
translation.zh: 什么后来？后来没同班就疏远了 他在优等班，我在放牛班

translation.en: I was in the other classes.
translation.zh: 他在优等班，我在放牛班

translation.en: Hey, who's this guy?
-Anybody remember him? -Who is that?
translation.zh: （艾瑞克）这个人呢？谁记得他？ 这个人呢？谁记得他？

translation.en: -Wow, what happened to that kid? -He's still here.
Why do I know my new kid's gonna end up looking like that?
translation.zh: 我未出世的小孩应该也会长那样

translation.en: -You're having a baby, Lenny? -Yeah, so I'm told, Mrs. Lamonsoff.
translation.zh: 你又要当爸爸了，雷尼？ 没错，蓝妈妈

translation.en: A surprise, huh?
Yes.
People today try to plan things out so much.
translation.zh: 其实现在的人想太多了

translation.en: But don't think an unexpected child is loved any less... ...than one you planned for.
translation.zh: 不小心怀的孩子也要好好照顾

translation.en: Someday, Lenny, you won't even remember what life was like with just three children.
translation.zh: 以后你会忘记只有三个孩子的感觉

translation.en: You think we wanted Eric?
translation.zh: 你以为我们想生艾瑞克吗？

translation.en: -He was an accident. -Mama.
His father and I were in the men's room at a Patriots game....
translation.zh: 他爸和我在球场的厕所...

translation.en: You know what, I think I'm just gonna turn the page here. I'm turning the page.
translation.zh: 赶快翻面 -我要翻了-让你妈讲完

translation.en: Finish the story!
Officer Dante is passed out on our lawn.
translation.zh: 丹警官在我们草坪昏倒了

translation.en: I know. I saw him trying to arrest an anthill.
translation.zh: 我知道，我看他想逮捕一个蚂蚁丘

translation.en: Want to talk about the whole pregnancy thing?
-It's okay. We'll talk tomorrow. -Okay.
translation.zh: 没关系，明天再聊 好

translation.en: Okay, you go to sleep. I'll make this between me and the baby.
Hello in there. This is your daddy speaking.
I just want to tell you welcome to the family...
translation.zh: 我想跟你说欢迎加入这个家庭

translation.en: ...and I love you very, very, very much.
I really don't care if you're a boy or girl.
translation.zh: 我不在乎你是男生女生

translation.en: I just need you to promise me one thing.
When you're in elementary school, study ballet...
translation.zh: 等你上小学的时候 要学芭蕾，我就能常看到那老师

translation.en: ...so I can see that teacher as much as possible.
translation.zh: 要学芭蕾，我就能常看到那老师

translation.en: -Hey. -I knew that was coming.
To be honest, I don't need no stinking ballet teacher.
translation.zh: 其实我不需要什么芭蕾老师

translation.en: I'm married to the most beautiful woman in the world, your mommy.
translation.zh: 我娶了天下第一大美女，你妈咪

translation.en: Are you saying sweet things to me because you want to fool around?
translation.zh: 嘴巴这么甜是想做爱吗？

translation.en: That would be a nice way to kick off the summer.
Okay, Mr. Romantic.
But let's do this quick. We have a big day tomorrow, okay?
translation.zh: 不要太久，明天是大日子

translation.en: Absolutely.
Watch your head in there.
Hang on. Hang on. I'm sorry, honey.
Don't move. Don't move. Oh, my God, I'm going to....
translation.zh: 等等，对不起，别动 天啊，要来了

translation.en: I did it! I burpsnarted! Yes!
translation.zh: 成功了，我放了嗝喷屁了 赞啊

translation.en: Lenny, grow up!
I did it for the baby!
